name: Canton Tower
short_description: Iconic 600m tall tower with observation decks
description: The Canton Tower is a 600-meter tall multi-purpose observation tower in the Haizhu District of Guangzhou. It is the tallest tower in China and the third tallest tower in the world. The tower features observation decks, restaurants, and entertainment facilities.
address: 222 Yuejiang West Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou

name: Chen Clan Ancestral Hall
short_description: Beautiful traditional Cantonese architecture and folk art museum
description: The Chen Clan Ancestral Hall is a traditional Chinese building complex in Guangzhou. It was built between 1890 and 1894 by the 72 Chen clans for their juniors' accommodation and preparation for imperial examinations. Today it houses the Guangdong Folk Art Museum.
address: 34 Enlongli, Zhongshan 7th Road, Liwan District, Guangzhou
